name: Kuang Shi
note: NOTE 1: It is necessary the presence of a Celestial Guard with a Kuang Shi Control Device to field Kuang Shi. NOTE 2: The Kuang Shi and the Celestial Guard with a Kuang Shi Control Device must belong to same Combat Group.

functions.func: if(units.sectorialName!='Japanese Sectorial Army'){ delete this.childsByCode['Chain Comm']; delete this.childsByCode['Chain Comm + Shotgun']; }

name: Sun Tze
note: There only can be one Sun Tze in each Army List.
